text: aur (ye sunakar) phiraun ne kaha ai mere darabaar ke saradaaron mujh ko to apane siva tumhaara koee paravaradigaar maaloom nahee hota (aur moosa doosare ko khuda bataata hai) to ai haamaan (vazeer phiraun) tum mere vaaste mittee (kee eeton) ka pajaava sulagao phir mere vaaste ek pukhta mahal taiyaar karao taaki mai (us par chadh kar) moosa ke khuda ko denkhoo aur mai to yaqeenan moosa ko jhootha samajhata hoon
